FL.content: death penalty as right to law, testifies that law is a violence contrary to nature, something “rotten” at the heart of law; police are a more spectral version of death penalty
FL.linkedContent: death penalty as right to law, testifies that law is a violence contrary to nature, something “rotten” at the heart of law; police are a more spectral version of death penalty

FL.content: police are the force of law, contamination of founding/preserving [force of law/Kafka’s Attendants, Foucault-like]
FL.linkedContent: police are the force of law, contamination of founding/preserving [force of law/Kafka’s Attendants, Foucault-like]

FL.content: for Benjamin, iterability precludes great founders, initiators, lawmakers (or “great” poets for Heidegger), preserves law, thus police become figure of this iterability
FL.linkedContent: for Benjamin, iterability precludes great founders, initiators, lawmakers (or “great” poets for Heidegger), preserves law, thus police become figure of this iterability

FL.content: police, index of ghostly violence, exemplary figure, figures w/out limit, w/out face or figure, not simply in uniform, a formless (gestaltlos) violence, all-pervasive specter
FL.linkedContent: police, index of ghostly violence, exemplary figure, figures w/out limit, w/out face or figure, not simply in uniform, a formless (gestaltlos) violence, all-pervasive specter

FL.content: police becoming technologically autonomous (invade all homes)
FL.linkedContent: police becoming technologically autonomous (invade all homes)

FL.content: spirit as police hauntings, spirit as dictatorship
via Benjamin, police violence of industrial democracies denies its own principle, democratic power would have no other name than police
FL.linkedContent: via Benjamin, police violence of industrial democracies denies its own principle, democratic power would have no other name than police

H.content: Kant against lying, duty to speak truth comes from freedom & pure intentionality of subject, but it introduces police everywhere (in our internal cellphones, our emails, most secret faxes of our private lives)
H.linkedContent: Kant against lying, duty to speak truth comes from freedom & pure intentionality of subject, but it introduces police everywhere (in our internal cellphones, our emails, most secret faxes of our private lives)

H.content: w/out right to lie > Kant subordinates rights of the home
H.linkedContent: w/out right to lie > Kant subordinates rights of the home

LOBL.content: all organized narration, a matter for the police, narrative voice surpasses police investigation, if possible
LOBL.linkedContent: all organized narration, a matter for the police, narrative voice surpasses police investigation, if possible

A.content: border becomes a problem as soon as edge-line is threatened, a step crossing an indivisible line (customs, police, visa—all established upon institution of indivisibility or identity of line)
A.linkedContent: border becomes a problem as soon as edge-line is threatened, a step crossing an indivisible line (customs, police, visa—all established upon institution of indivisibility or identity of line)

POOF.content: via & beyond Schmitt, der geschwisterlichen Klang (the brotherly-sisterly sound), the obscure friendship of rhyme, insane linking (appariement) of a couple, sense is born in a pair > before being philosophical, friendship concerns gift of the poem, isn’t there always a politics of a rhyme? > the rhyme can also become a traffic signal (philautie of linkage) > nothing looks more like the traffic signals of one country than those of another: this is the law > everything begins w/ Echo: rhymes sign, in cadence they seal a belonging, an ‘open gate’ [?]
POOF.linkedContent: via & beyond Schmitt, der geschwisterlichen Klang (the brotherly-sisterly sound), the obscure friendship of rhyme, insane linking (appariement) of a couple, sense is born in a pair > before being philosophical, friendship concerns gift of the poem, isn’t there always a politics of a rhyme? > the rhyme can also become a traffic signal (philautie of linkage) > nothing looks more like the traffic signals of one country than those of another: this is the law > everything begins w/ Echo: rhymes sign, in cadence they seal a belonging, an ‘open gate’ [?]

PAS.content: in a moment of extreme, precipitous virtuosity, where o (mort, fors, faux, faut, zéro, mot) resonates everywhere and nom turns to mon, Derrida asks himself if his policing overzealousness [to unmask the absence of the name, le pas-de-nom] deciphers identities [maur/chot, m’: o], wants to catch everything in a dragnet (filet)
PAS.linkedContent: in a moment of extreme, precipitous virtuosity, where o (mort, fors, faux, faut, zéro, mot) resonates everywhere and nom turns to mon, Derrida asks himself if his policing overzealousness [to unmask the absence of the name, le pas-de-nom] deciphers identities [maur/chot, m’: o], wants to catch everything in a dragnet (filet)

PAS.content: [re: Blanchot] name we know him by can serve as a hiding place (cache), throw readers off track into complacency of police investigation > thus plus de nom
PAS.linkedContent: [re: Blanchot] name we know him by can serve as a hiding place (cache), throw readers off track into complacency of police investigation > thus plus de nom

SH.content: tragic inversion of shibboleth, corruption of its differential value, from condition of alliance to discriminating limit, policing, normalization, methodical subjugation
SH.linkedContent: tragic inversion of shibboleth, corruption of its differential value, from condition of alliance to discriminating limit, policing, normalization, methodical subjugation

SH.content: because one can make use of shibboleth, it can be turned against oneself, the circumcised are proscribed, held at border, excluded, reduced to ashes, in the mere name
SH.linkedContent: because one can make use of shibboleth, it can be turned against oneself, the circumcised are proscribed, held at border, excluded, reduced to ashes, in the mere name

DPi.content: w/ DP, rationality rises above heart (individual passion), alliance btwn reason & machine, universal claim of state right, frozen rigor, rigor mortis, “freezing insensitivity,” police-like, virile appearance > thus, many abolitionists appeal to feminine, heart, immediate feeling
DPi.linkedContent: w/ DP, rationality rises above heart (individual passion), alliance btwn reason & machine, universal claim of state right, frozen rigor, rigor mortis, “freezing insensitivity,” police-like, virile appearance > thus, many abolitionists appeal to feminine, heart, immediate feeling

REST.content: Derrida’s “close reading,” a policing, “if police there is (and isn’t there always),” played out via the size (pointure) of a comma, that which separates “pair” (of shoes) from “the product” > not a temporal interval but a syntactic fact
REST.linkedContent: Derrida’s “close reading,” a policing, “if police there is (and isn’t there always),” played out via the size (pointure) of a comma, that which separates “pair” (of shoes) from “the product” > not a temporal interval but a syntactic fact

REST.content: he is operating against another police, another ideological arrangement
REST.linkedContent: he is operating against another police, another ideological arrangement

REST.content: the police who lock you outside the text (enferme en tout hâte dans un prétendu hors-texte): the pre-text of perception, of living speech, of bare hands (mains nue), of living creation, of real history, etc. (subject you to the oldest, most dogmatic, most sinisterly authoritarian of programs, the most massive mediatizing machines)
REST.linkedContent: the police who lock you outside the text (enferme en tout hâte dans un prétendu hors-texte): the pre-text of perception, of living speech, of bare hands (mains nue), of living creation, of real history, etc. (subject you to the oldest, most dogmatic, most sinisterly authoritarian of programs, the most massive mediatizing machines)

REST.content: comes down to a decision about the frame, a border (bordure) which is double in its trait: joins together what it splits (partage): “at stake are (il y va) all the interests caught up in the trial (procès) of this split (partage),” what separates external from internal > a police inquiry, inquiry into the police: police always more & other than what one might want to limit under this name
REST.linkedContent: comes down to a decision about the frame, a border (bordure) which is double in its trait: joins together what it splits (partage): “at stake are (il y va) all the interests caught up in the trial (procès) of this split (partage),” what separates external from internal > a police inquiry, inquiry into the police: police always more & other than what one might want to limit under this name

TR.content: police, prosecutors, torturers know jubilatory pleasure of handling confession machines
TR.linkedContent: police, prosecutors, torturers know jubilatory pleasure of handling confession machines

LI.content: associating non-present w/ restance adds spectacular blinking-effect to warning light: rhythm of blinking essential to mark
LI.linkedContent: associating non-present w/ restance adds spectacular blinking-effect to warning light: rhythm of blinking essential to mark

LI.content: another parasitic/fictional structure can always be added, “supplément de code” > everything becomes possible against the language-police
LI.linkedContent: another parasitic/fictional structure can always be added, “supplément de code” > everything becomes possible against the language-police

LI.content: never be able to de-limit object-fiction/object-parasite except by another counter-fiction
LI.linkedContent: never be able to de-limit object-fiction/object-parasite except by another counter-fiction

LI.content: always police & tribunal there when a rule is invoked [re: context, event, signature], because conventions can be violated (in themselves and by fictionality that constitutes them)
LI.linkedContent: always police & tribunal there when a rule is invoked [re: context, event, signature], because conventions can be violated (in themselves and by fictionality that constitutes them)

LI.content: psychiatric expert in service of State & its police
LI.linkedContent: psychiatric expert in service of State & its police

LI.content: every police (red light) is not repressive: law not necessarily tied to negativity, prohibition, repression
LI.linkedContent: every police (red light) is not repressive: law not necessarily tied to negativity, prohibition, repression

LI.content: every institution designed to enforce the law is a police (i.e. the Academy), doesn’t have to be physical, can be “spiritual,” can be more noble
LI.linkedContent: every institution designed to enforce the law is a police (i.e. the Academy), doesn’t have to be physical, can be “spiritual,” can be more noble

LI.content: a repressive police can only be opposed by another police, reference to a more just police
LI.linkedContent: a repressive police can only be opposed by another police, reference to a more just police

LI.content: repressive police on border btwn alleged academic freedom, press, & state power > a kind of academic “interpol”
LI.linkedContent: repressive police on border btwn alleged academic freedom, press, & state power > a kind of academic “interpol”

CF.content: Benjamin’s police w/out borders—faceless, formless specter of its ghostly apparition extends endlessly
CF.linkedContent: Benjamin’s police w/out borders—faceless, formless specter of its ghostly apparition extends endlessly

CF.content: Derrida not launching unjust, utopic discourse of suspicion against police, especially in their fight against drug-trafficking, terrorism, mafias
CF.linkedContent: Derrida not launching unjust, utopic discourse of suspicion against police, especially in their fight against drug-trafficking, terrorism, mafias

LG.content: brutal, mercilessly depleting selectivity—a certain police brutality an accomplice to concern for professional competence
LG.linkedContent: brutal, mercilessly depleting selectivity—a certain police brutality an accomplice to concern for professional competence

OG.content: writing of voice, une meilleure police (civil order [?]) > also a machine of death
OG.linkedContent: writing of voice, une meilleure police (civil order [?]) > also a machine of death

ATAP.content: Kant’s University tribunal or police of metaphysical integrity
apocalypse a challenge to maintenance of order (la police) of destination, la police postale, to the monopoly of posts
ATAP.linkedContent: apocalypse a challenge to maintenance of order (la police) of destination, la police postale, to the monopoly of posts

EU.content: need to bring more clarity to the understanding of a language is both a juridical & philosophical pursuit (policing too)
EU.linkedContent: need to bring more clarity to the understanding of a language is both a juridical & philosophical pursuit (policing too)

EU.content: decree re: move from Latin to French: no more alibi of ignorance to law, no more ambiguity or uncertainty before French laws written so clearly
EU.linkedContent: decree re: move from Latin to French: no more alibi of ignorance to law, no more ambiguity or uncertainty before French laws written so clearly

EU.content: destination not thesis/theme or category > what happens to question “what is?” when it’s measured against destination? > strategic force of this question, “lever,” even polemological: new military-industrial complex strategies should be included/welcomed by CIPH
EU.linkedContent: destination not thesis/theme or category > what happens to question “what is?” when it’s measured against destination? > strategic force of this question, “lever,” even polemological: new military-industrial complex strategies should be included/welcomed by CIPH
